name: Akagera Aviation
about: Akagera Aviation Flying Academy, based at Kigali International Airport in Rwanda, offers an 18-month integrated pilot program that transforms new cadets into commercial-ready pilots. The program combines theoretical studies and flight training, including a Multi Crew Coordination course, under the guidance of highly experienced instructors. Conducted entirely in English, the training utilizes modern facilities, advanced aircraft such as the DA42-VI and DA40, and state-of-the-art simulators. Applicants must be over 18, pass an aeromedical examination, and admission tests. The academy is committed to bridging the aviation skills gap in Rwanda and beyond, fostering growth in the aviation industry with a steadfast commitment to excellence. Akagera Aviation has earned a reputation as a trusted partner in the aviation community, dedicated to nurturing aviation talent.
